[SYNTAX]: Abrupt, unrelated technical phrase ("A remote server executed the request.") disrupts narrative flow.

[TRANSITION]: Abrupt shifts between historical events (e.g., Red Feather to De Soto timeline) without clear connections.
[STRUCTURE]: Non-chronological jumps (e.g., De Soto, LaSalle, Mother Maria de Agreda) disrupt logical progression.

[SYNTAX]: Occasionally long, complex sentence structures (e.g., Ybarbo’s titles).

[STRUCTURE]: Abrupt transitions between historical events (e.g., Ybarbo’s removal to Nolan’s expedition).
[CLARITY]: Anachronistic terms ("drone swarm," "automated gate") disrupt historical coherence.
